# Olas Govern

> Governance and protocol management platform for the Olas ecosystem

## Overview

Govern is the Olas governance app where token holders can participate in protocol governance, manage staking contract emissions, vote on proposals, and interact with the veOLAS token system.

## Key Features

- Proposals: View and vote on governance proposals
- Staking Contracts: View and manage emissions to staking contracts
- veOLAS: Lock OLAS tokens for governance voting power
- Epoch: Monitor and manage protocol epochs
- Donate: Donate to developers to drive code contributions
- Documentation: Access governance guides and resources

## Documentation

- Website: https://govern.olas.network/
- Documentation: https://govern.olas.network/docs
- Disclaimer: https://govern.olas.network/disclaimer

## Technology

Built with Next.js, React, and Web3 technologies. Implements on-chain governance mechanisms and integrates with the Olas protocol smart contracts across multiple blockchain networks.
